Tweaks some of the (de)buff settings. Notably, NearTrauma now only lasts 10 minutes and hunger and thirsty are now more realistic.

modletInfos.displayName: Doughs - Ailment: Infection Is Random And Quicker
modletInfos.modletDescription: Makes standard infection more deadly by randomizing infection countdown times.
Makes it dark as possible indoors

Makes very thick fog for both day and night. Density varies due to weather but never leaves. Credit to Donovans original nightfog modlet for inspiration
Lowers block stability glue of several block types. All in game buildings or parts of them not built with this in mind may collapse very easily.

Increases animal spawn in wilderness but decreases it in cities. Increases zombie spawn in cities but decreases it in the wilderness.

modletInfos.modletName: Khaine's XML Based Headshot Only Mod.

modletInfos.modletDescription: Zombies only take full damage from headshots. The headshot damage is further modified by default vanilla difficulty settings.

modletInfos.modletName: Khaine's Pick up wild plants mod
modletInfos.displayName: Khaine's Pick up wild plants mod
modletInfos.modletDescription: This modlet restores the ability to pick up wild plants using E, like cotton, corn, goldenrod, etc. Doing this does NOT benefit from perks. You still need to punch them for that.
Removes the window that shows POI names and the skulls for folks who want a more immersive feel.
Removes the tracker in the top right that shows POI names/biomes and the skulls for folks who want a more immersive feel.
